lead_paragraph: Formula One supremo Bernie Ecclestone has dampened hopes of more races being held in the United States, at least in the near term, after the sport's takeover by Liberty Media.

headline.print_headline: Motor Racing: Hard to Add More U.S. F1 Races, Says Ecclestone
headline.main: Motor Racing: Hard to Add More U.S. F1 Races, Says Ecclestone

snippet: Formula One supremo Bernie Ecclestone has dampened hopes of more races being held in the United States, at least in the near term, after the sport's takeover by Liberty Media....
